name: Jail Breaker: Sneak Out!
description:
This is the relaxing and funny casual game you've been looking for! Come save Tom from prison and help him get rid off those police in Jail Breaker: Sneak Out!

In each level you will be given multiple choices to help our hero get away from some tricky troubles. You have to solve this survival problem with your brain quickly because these cops are always chasing! Is your IQ high enough to keep Tom safe？

Game Features:

1. Unique Level Design
New levels updated every month! Choose the right answers will get you to a new land that you’ve never seen.

2. A Game for All Ages
Everybody in your family can play Jail Breaker. Ask your family and love ones to join in if you need help!

3. An Addicting Game with Connected Levels
Once you start you will be hooked on solving these puzzles! You never know what's coming next!

4. Play for FREE!
No money needed for a lot of fun!

Jail Breaker: Sneak Out is the game that brings all brain teasers and quiz together with a good time! Come join Tom’s adventure now!
developers: 上海源栈科技有限公司
